generic:link.msg:message: Number of outstanding PPIs as on period end equals to Number of outstanding PPI at the end of previous period + Total number of fresh PPIs issued during the period - Total number of PPIs closed during the period, where there was no balance left - Total number of PPIs closed during the period, with unspent balance - Total number of expired PPIs whose unspent amount is forfeited during the period

Amount outstanding against PPIs as on period end equals to Amount outstanding against PPIs at the end of previous period + Total amount of loading/re-loading transactions using debit/credit card/debit to bank account during the period + Total amount of loading/re-loading transactions using cash during the period + Total amount of loading/re-loading transactions using PPIs issued by the same PPI issuer during the period + Total amount of loading/re-loading transactions using PPIs issued by other PPI issuers during the period - Total amount of PPI to merchants (P2M) transactions(excluding the cross border outward transactions) during the period - Total amount of transactions involving fund transfer from PPI to PPI issued by same PPI issuer during the period - Total amount of transactions involving fund transfer from PPI to PPI issued by other PPI issuers during the period - Total amount of PPI to Bank account (P2B) transactions during the period - Total amount of cash withdrawal transactions using PPIs during the period - Total amount of cross border outward transactions during the period - Total amount forfeited during the period

Number of outstanding PPIs as on period end equals to Number of outstanding PPI at the end of previous period + Total number of fresh PPIs issued during the period - Total number of PPIs closed during the period, where there was no balance left - Total number of PPIs closed during the period, with unspent balance - Total number of expired PPIs whose unspent amount is forfeited during the period

Amount outstanding against PPIs as on period end = Amount outstanding against PPIs at the end of previous period + Total amount of loading/re-loading transactions using debit/credit card/debit to bank account during the period + Total amount of loading/re-loading transactions using cash during the period + Total amount of loading/re-loading transactions using PPIs issued by the same PPI issuer during the period + Total amount of loading/re-loading transactions using PPIs issued by other PPI issuers during the period - Total amount of PPI to merchants (P2M) transactions(excluding the cross border outward transactions) during the period - Total amount of PPI to Bank account (P2B) transactions during the period - Total amount forfeited during the period

Number of outstanding PPIs as on period end equals to Number of outstanding PPI at the end of previous period + Total number of fresh PPIs issued during the period - Total number of PPIs closed during the period, where there was no balance left - Total number of PPIs closed during the period, with unspent balance - Total number of expired PPIs whose unspent amount is forfeited during the period

Amount outstanding against PPIs as on period end = Amount outstanding against PPIs at the end of previous period + Total amount of loading/re-loading transactions using debit/credit card/debit to bank account during the period + Total amount of loading/re-loading transactions using cash during the period + Total amount of loading/re-loading transactions using PPIs issued by the same PPI issuer during the period + Total amount of loading/re-loading transactions using PPIs issued by other PPI issuers during the period - Total amount of PPI to merchants (P2M) transactions(excluding the cross border outward transactions) during the period - Total amount of PPI to Bank account (P2B) transactions during the period - Total amount forfeited during the period

Amount outstanding against PPIs as on period end equals to Amount outstanding against PPIs at the end of previous period + Total amount of loading/re-loading transactions using debit/credit card/debit to bank account during the period + Total amount of loading/re-loading transactions using cash during the period + Total amount of loading/re-loading transactions using PPIs issued by the same PPI issuer during the period + Total amount of loading/re-loading transactions using PPIs issued by other PPI issuers during the period - Total amount of PPI to merchants (P2M) transactions(excluding the cross border outward transactions) during the period - Total amount of transactions involving fund transfer from PPI to PPI issued by same PPI issuer during the period - Total amount of transactions involving fund transfer from PPI to PPI issued by other PPI issuers during the period - Total amount of PPI to Bank account (P2B) transactions during the period - Total amount of cross border outward transactions during the period - Total amount forfeited during the period

Total number of loading/re-loading transactions using cross border inward remittance facility under MTSS should be less than or equal to Total number of loading/re-loading transactions using cash during the month

Total amount of loading/re-loading transactions using cross border inward remittance facility under MTSS should be less than or equal to Total amount of loading/re-loading transactions using cash during the month
